title: Happy Birthday Barack Obama, The Rock, XFL, Bill Gates and more.
itunes:title: Happy Birthday Barack Obama, The Rock, XFL, Bill Gates and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The mask debate is on. "Thanks for helping us stay inside!" LMBAO!!! J. Anthony Brown gives the harsh truth when a baby daddy is losing on the scoreboard in Ask Bitterman. Comedian Rodney Perry tests positive for COVID-19. Happy 59th Birthday to President Barack Obama. Junior has a birthday poem just for 44. Dr. Desmond Carson from Richmond, CA gives us his candid opinion about the current COVID-19 situation. Dwayne Johnson is now part owner of the XFL. Snoop reveals that Jay-Z wrote Dre's verse on Still D.R.E. Bank of America has a special $1 billion partnership. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve straight up tells us that he won't do another four years of this and we are 91 days away from making a difference.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The mask debate is on. "Thanks for helping us stay inside!" LMBAO!!! J.
